Boats Animator 0.7.2

  • Posted: 2016-06-26 23:55:36 +0200
  • Author: Charlie Lee

Boats Animator 0.7.2 is now available. This version add frame numbers above frame reel thumbnails and restyles the scrollbars in the program.

There have also been a number of improvements to Boats Animator’s build process; this greatly streamlines the process of releasing new versions and will allow more time to be spent on implementing new features.

  • © 2016 Charlie Lee
